extendedInfo.description: Step aboard the 1914 Orient Express in this award-winning mystery adventure from Prince of Persia creator Jordan Mechner, now for the first time on Android! JULY, 1914. With Europe on the brink of war, the luxurious Orient Express departs Paris for Constantinople, plunging American doctor Robert Cath into a maelstrom of treachery, romance, and international intrigue.The Last Express is a complete, faithful Android version of the internationally-acclaimed 1997 PC classic.GAME FEATURES:- 20+ hours of game play- Interact with 30+ characters who behave like actual people on a train -- moving about in real-time and conversing in their native languages- Eavesdrop on conversations, sneak into compartments, and uncover clues- Explore a richly detailed, historically accurate 3D recreation of the 1914 Orient Express- Your actions affect other charactersâ behavior, making every play-through different- Rewind feature allows you to back up to any point in the story and choose a different course of action- Playable in 5 languages: English, French, German, Italian and SpanishADDITIONAL FEATURES ON ANDROID:- Unlock challenging achievements that test your sleuthing skills- Dynamic, 3-tiered hint system created specifically for mobile - 20 unlockable character biographies- Unlock cinematics to replay at any time****************"The Last Express is just one of those games that adventure fans, or just fans of a good story, need to play." 4/4 - Slide To Play"A shining example of how deeply gameplay and storytelling can be intertwined" 5/5 - AppSpy"It's a piece of videogame history and a shining example of what can be done to create an experience so much more immersive than the Heavy Rains of today." - 8/10, Destructoid****************âExquisite design and a literary story. A thrilling ride.â â NewsweekâThe top adventure gameâ¦ thumbs up by all ages and both genders.â â Family PCâA masterpiece.â â Computer Games Strategy PlusâGrippingâ¦ amazingâ¦ totally unique. The best adventure game I have ever played. Beautiful, skillfully crafted, and worth every penny and hour of your time.â â Games Domain ReviewFOR MORE ABOUT THE LAST EXPRESS, VISIT:http://www.facebook.com/lastexpressfacebook.com/dotemutwitter.com/dotemuyoutube.com/dotemuhttp://jordanmechner.com//*** Please make sure you have 1.5GB of free space on your device before buying ***\

reviews.title: So great
reviews.comment: I finished this game on my pc years ago and loved the story. I still have the disks and the resource guide and recently thought of trying to get it working again. Then I found this! The controls are OK and the story is excellent.
reviews.author: John Achenbach

reviews.title: Bad port
reviews.comment: The controls on Android are terrible. I\'ve played this on the pc and loved it. I loathe this version, the atrocious touch controls make me quit in rage :( wish I could get a refund but the download took so dang long.
reviews.author: Shinra JL

reviews.title: Game itself is all-time classic but...
reviews.comment: ...the port is far from being excellent. It runs smooth and technically good but there are some little things that keep me from rate this game to five. First, if enabled, touch controls on the screen annoyingly blinking. Second, suprisingly there is no landscape mode, only portrait. And finally, no subtitles, so if you want to play it in some crowded place, you must grab headphones in order to understand what\'s going on in the game.

reviews.title: One of a kind
reviews.comment: I\'m really enjoying so far, its quite unique compared to other point and click style adventures. The first person aspect is very immersive and the atmosphere is very cleverly done. There is a subtle hint system if your lost. Its also a lengthy game as far as I understand, 20 plus hours. Unfortunately character animations are hit and miss, some characters sort of move picture book style and others fluid as you interact with them. Be patient with it.
reviews.author: Nick Brown

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love this game. I never finished playing it when I was a teen and it\'s just as fun and intriguing as I remember. Great artwork. I wish when I started the game it wouldn\'t load half off the screen sometimes, that would be the only thing I would like fixed. Otherwise great, and worth the money to download.
reviews.author: Emily Maupin

reviews.title: Quasi ingiocabile...
reviews.comment: Buona idea per vivacizzare il genere delle avventure punta e clicca ma l\'interfaccia utente \303\250 atroce e lo rende quasi ingiocabile... considerando che spesso le azioni richiedono una risposta entro un certo tempo, ne pu\303\262 conseguire una notevole  frustrazione...
reviews.author: Giorgio Balestrieri

reviews.title: The best adventure ever created
reviews.comment: You live a suspicion and adventure film in real time.Caution:  you are in a train during gameplay, it is a huge game &there are no subtitles. The best adventure game ever created. BUY IT.
reviews.author: A. Ruhi Soylu

reviews.title: Need Help!!
reviews.comment: It\'s not downloading! I have enough space on my phone, it say downloading but I can\'t see any download percentage.  I\'ve tried a few times and even restarted my phone.
reviews.author: Kelly Mecini

reviews.title: Dull
reviews.comment: Slow plot development and rather dull.
reviews.author: Esther Ptolomey

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love how easy it is to pause and continue. A brilliant port. Thanks
reviews.author: Hrvoje Bartulovic

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Controls don\'t work properly so can\'t play the game. Waste of money!! Unimpressed!
reviews.author: Tom Freret

reviews.title: Why no subtitles
reviews.comment: I have heard many great things about the game and always wanted to play it - The port looks great, but why isn\'t there an option for subtitles when playing on the go?
reviews.author: Zach Levi

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: How do you catch the beetle?
reviews.author: Eric Satagaj

reviews.title: Great to play such a classic game again.
reviews.comment: A great port of a great game.  I never actually finished this game back in the 90\'s and i\'m loving the chance to play it through now :) I had some troubles getting it installed at first, but the Devs were extremely helpful and friendly and now it\'s working great!
reviews.author: Garr rehal

reviews.title: Constantly crashing on my Samsung galaxy tab 2
reviews.comment: Finally got it to work. I guess crashes that I have been having were caused by messed up game progress(due to crashes). Wish I had a start new game option.
reviews.author: Edi \304\214elar

reviews.title: Asus Google Nexus 7 2012
reviews.comment: Just like many other people say, its a masterpiece type of game, a unique must try game. Maybe the first of its kind for android and iOS.
reviews.author: Gary Tran

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: An all time great game, very well adapted to mobile, thanks to the developers!
reviews.author: shaun aitcheson

reviews.title: Buy this game!
reviews.comment: Say thanks for  supporting android!
reviews.author: Steven Mercer

reviews.title: Classic
reviews.comment: An excellent real-time point-and-click adventure lovingly recreated for Android. My basic knowledge of French is finally good for something.
reviews.author: Dean Mobbs

reviews.title: About time!
reviews.comment: One of the greatest adventure games on PC is finally on Android, and you should just pick it up if you\'re a fan of a great plot and adventure. The initial price is quite low as well. Seriously, now Telltale has no reason to keep Walking Dead off Android, they need to follow DotEmu and Revolution Games (creators of Broken Sword).  Buy this now!
reviews.author: Abhijeet Mishra
